Package com.ap.kas.services.mappers

Class UserMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ap.kas.services.mappers.UserMapper
  • @Service
public class UserMapper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to map User/Employee/Customer objects to the different Dto's
